Name: Verify the Top bar UI Functionality
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Open the home page of the website.
Check for the presence of the "About Us," "Contact," and "Find Us" buttons.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
A new window opens displaying all store booths located in major 
supermarkets.

A new window opens prompting the user to enter details (First Name, Last 
Name, Phone Number, Email, Subject, Message) with a "Submit" button.
All Fields are Required.

The page scrolls to the end of the home page, displaying a brief 
description of the store, Contact links and Social Contact Icons.

Name: Verify that a promotional message is displayed in the center of the top bar
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Open the home page of the website.

Check for the presence of a "40% discount on your 1st order" message in the 
center.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
A promotional message is displayed prominently in the center of the top 
bar.

Name: Verify the second bar UI Functionality
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Open the home page of the website.

Check for the presence of the logo on the left, the search bar in the 
center, and "Signup/Login" options on the right.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The second bar contains all required elements, and the "Signup/Login" 
options are functional.

Name: Verify the third bar UI Functionality
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Open the home page of the website.
Locate the third bar (main navigation bar).

Check for the presence of "Home," "Vegetables," "Fruits," "Meat," and "Shop 
All" links.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The navigation bar contains all required links, with "Home" in bold to 
indicate the current page.
All vegetable items display price, weight, image, and name.
All fruit items display price, weight, image, and name.
Verify that all meat items display price, weight, image, and name.

Verify that a combined list of all available items across categories is 
displayed.

Name: Verify Recommended Items Display
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify that images of random recommended items with suggestions to try are 
displayed.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Recommended items are displayed correctly.

Name: Verify "Shop Now" Button Functionality
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Locate the "Shop Now" button on the home page.
Click the button and verify that it redirects to the "Shop All" page.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user is redirected to the "Shop All" page.

Verify that users have the option to sign up via Google, Facebook, or

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Users can sign up using any method, and validation rules are applied.

Name: Varify Payment Method selection.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify payment type selection (Cash on Delivery or Pay by Card).
Verify that the system accepts the selection.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The payment Method is selected successfully.

Name: Verify Payment Method Restrictions for First-Time Orders
Precondition: New user's account with no order history.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify payment type selection (Cash on Delivery or Pay by Card).
Verify that the system accepts the selection.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The payment Method is selected successfully.

"Pay by Card" payment must be available.
"Cash on Delivery" option should be disabled/grayed.

Name: Card Payment Validation
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify payment type selection (Cash on Delivery or Pay by Card).
Verify that the system accepts the selection.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The payment Method is selected successfully.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid card number (16 digits).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
card type (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) is detected and displayed correct card 
logo dynamically based on the first 4 digits.
pass Luhn’s Algorithm for credit card number validation.
Displays the input as "**** **** **** 1234" for security.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Enter a valid name on card (alphabets (A-Z, a-z), spaces, and hyphens) with 
(2 characters min to 50 characters max).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Automatically format the input as "MM/YY" as the user types.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid CVV (3-4 digits depending on the card type).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Masks input as "***" for security.
The order is placed successfully, and a confirmation is shown.

Name: Varify Profile Drop-Down Menu

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify that a drop-down menu appears with options: "My Orders," "My 
Wallet," "My Account," and "Logout".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The drop-down menu is displayed correctly.

Name: Varify Past Orders View

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify that a drop-down menu appears with options: "My Orders," "My 
Wallet," "My Account," and "Logout".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The drop-down menu is displayed correctly.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to "My Orders" from the profile menu.

Verify that a list of past orders is displayed, including order date, total 
price, recipient details, delivery day, and options to "Buy Again" or "View 
Item".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: All past orders are displayed with the required details.

Name: Varify Viewing and Editing Saved Address
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Opens a page where users can view their current saved address details, 
including street name, house number, floor number, and associated phone 
number and option to edit or change this address or add a completely new 
additional address.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify that the current saved address is displayed.
Edit the address and save changes.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The address is updated successfully.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Add a new additional address with valid details and save.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The new address is added successfully.

Name: Varify View Personal Information

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify that a drop-down menu appears with options: "My Orders," "My 
Wallet," "My Account," and "Logout".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The drop-down menu is displayed correctly.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify that personal information (first name, last name, phone number, 
address details including "street", "city" and "zip code") is displayed.
Edit the information and Click "Update Information".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The personal information is updated successfully.
The system discard any unsaved changes.

Name: Verify forget password functionality
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Open the home page of the website.

Check for the presence of the logo on the left, the search bar in the 
center, and "Signup/Login" options on the right.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:

Send a reset password email to the provided email.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Try login with email and the new password.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Navigate to the Home Page.
Navigate back to the Login page.

Verify that the cart displays a list of added items and order summary, and 
an option to proceed to checkout.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The cart overview and order summary are displayed correctly.
A new window opens displaying Checkout Page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Force item to become out-of-stock (via admin panel).

Item remains in cart but shows "Out of Stock" status.
"Proceed"Checkout button becomes disabled.

Name: Verify Real-Time stock status updates
Folder: /Valid test Cases/Web Site/Home Page and Search
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Force items stock to 'out of stock' (via admin panel)
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The items update to "Out of Stock" status within 5 seconds.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Force items stock to 'in stock' (via admin panel)
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The items show normal status.
